column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=What is your opinion on the war in Iraq ?
#Text=I believe it is coming to a resolution with both the Iraqi government seeking a timetable and both Iraqi and US military forces finding success in quelling hostility .
#Text=I cannot change what is in the past , but I can shape the future .
#Text=I would seek total drawdown in Iraq within two years .
#Text=What is your opinion on the war in Afghanistan ?
#Text=The real focus of our " war on terror " should be where al Qaeda is , and that is primarily in eastern Afghanistan .

column1: #Text=The war against bin Laden and his group will continue , as will the war against the Taliban .
#Text=It will not be an easy task , as we have already seen .
#Text=More troops will be needed and more international cooperation to wipe out this societal cancer .
#Text=What is your opinion on the creation of a North American Union ?
#Text=I am totally against the formation of a North American Union .
#Text=This is a goal of the Council on Foreign Relations , which you could call America 's " shadow government . "
#Text=Both Obama and McCain are members of the CFR , as are many of President Bush 's administrative staff .
#Text=Who needs foreign affairs experience when the CFR is going to tell you what to do ?
#Text=I will investigate all work to date on this effort to create the NAU , including the NAFTA superhighway and Rudi Giuliani 's law firm 's involvement in it .
#Text=There is a lot of " quiet " work that has already been done on the NAU project without the American public 's knowledge .
#Text=This will make the Teapot Dome scandal look like kids ' play .
#Text=On other issues
#Text=Is there anything else you would like to say to people reading this article ?
#Text=If you think the safe thing to do Nov. 4 is vote for the Republican or Democratic candidate of your " choice , " then you are sadly mistaken .
#Text=Both will continue to lead this country down the road to a North American Union and the New World ( socialist ) Order .

#Text=The only way " we the people " can shake up Washington and bring about revolutionary change in our government is through the election of a true independent President - our first since George Washington !
#Text=Following is a list of my intentions .
#Text=As President I Will :
#Text=1. Complete a secure border fence on our southern border .
#Text=2. Sign The Fair Tax Bill to rejuvenate economy .
#Text=3. Establish “ loser pays ” litigation reform and work tirelessly for real tort reform .
#Text=4. Transition our monetary system to a specie-backed currency and close the Federal Reserve System .
#Text=5. Seek to overturn Roe vs. Wade and return the decision to the States .
#Text=6. Work to establish term limits for Congress .
